addGroup.description: Adds one or more groups to the current User.

removeGroup.description: Removes one or more groups from the current User.

syncGroups.description: Syncs the current User's groups with the provided groups.

getGroups.description: Returns an array of the current User's groups.

getPermissions.description: Returns an array of the current User's permissions.

addPermission.description: Adds one or more permissions to the current User.

removePermission.description: Removes one or more permissions from the current User.

syncPermissions.description: Syncs the current User's permissions with the provided permissions.

hasPermission.description: Returns true if the current User has the provided permission.

can.description: Returns true if the current User has all of the provided permissions.

inGroup.description: Returns true if the current User is in all of the provided groups.
